text: Ara allah tomadera srsti karechena mati theke, tarapara sukrakita theke, tarapare tini tomadera baniyechena yugala. Ara kono nari garbhadharana kare na athaba prasaba kare na tamra janara ba'ire. Ara kono bayaska lokera bayesa bare na ebam tara bayesa theke kichu kame'o na, baram ta rayeche kitabe. Eti niscaya'i allahâ€Œra pakse sahajasadhya.
